question: 5 (b)
statement_html:
Consider the region below the graph \(\displaystyle y = 1-x^{3}\) (and above the x axis) between \(x=0\) and \(x=1\).

b) Find the volume of the solid dome obtained by rotating this region about the y-axis.
statement_latex:
Consider the region below the graph $\displaystyle y = 1-x^{3}$ (and
above the \emph{x} axis) between $x=0$ and $x=1$.

b) Find the volume of the solid dome obtained by rotating this region
about the \emph{y}-axis.
statement_raw:
Consider the region below the graph <math> \displaystyle y = 1-x^{3} </math> (and above the ''x'' axis) between <math>x=0 </math> and <math>x=1 </math>.

b) Find the volume of the solid dome obtained by rotating this region about the ''y''-axis.
